name: Vyrewatch
effectDescription: Steal up to 5 Health from rival.\nDiscard 1 random card from rival's hand.

name: Werewolf Rebel
effectDescription: Remove 2 Health.\nDeal 4 damage to rival.

name: Worthy Opponent
effectDescription: If your next Creature has 10 or more Health, gain 1 Base Attack.

name: Wyrd
effectDescription: Remove 4 Health from all rival's Creatures in play.\nRemove 2 Health from all your Creatures in play.

name: Sap Life Force
effectDescription: Steal up to 2 Health from your next Creature.

name: Rush of Strength
effectDescription: Remove 10 Health.\nGain 3 Temporary Attack.

name: Safalaan Hallow
effectDescription: Draw 1 Vampyre.

name: Mass Drain
effectDescription: Steal up to 1 Health from all Creatures in play.

name: Alpha Werewolf
effectDescription: Deal 4 damage to Rival.\nOr\nMortal: Deal 8 damage to rival.

name: Gorge
effectDescription: Steal up to 3 Health\nOr\nMortal: Steal up to 7 Health from rival.

name: Gravecreeper
effectDescription: If you have 4 or more Allies in your hand, deal 15 damage to rival.\nAlways discard all Allies.

name: Shadow Stalk
effectDescription: Battle rival.\nOr\nMortal: Strike rival.

name: Terror Dog
effectDescription: Gain 1 Temporary Attack.\nOr\nMortal: Gain 4 Temporary Attack.

name: Dragon Set
effectDescription: Add 2 copies of  <color=blue>Dragon Arrows</color> to your hand.

name: Lady Raven
effectDescription: Deal Damage equal to your total Gold.

name: Shield Dome
effectDescription: Gain Armour equal to half your hand size.

name: Wise Old Man
effectDescription: Deal Damage to all your Creatures equal to your hand size.

name: Entangle
effectDescription: Deal Damage to your next Creature equal to your hand size.
